properties.name: cutPattern
properties.description: The file pattern matching the paths to the CUT files.

properties.name: fallbackTestPattern
properties.description: The file pattern matching the paths to the hidden/fallback test files.

properties.name: mutantFilePattern
properties.description: The file pattern matching the paths to the mutant files.

properties.name: gameProgressionCSV
properties.description: The path to the CSV file containing the game progression data.

properties.name: initData
properties.description: If this is set to true, the application will look for java files and insert them in the DB as CUTs.

properties.name: jarsToInclude
properties.description: A list of jar files to include in the classpath when running the tests.
